channel.title: 2 problems
channel.description:
Alright if i make d bow str bonus or range bonus down will that make it less powerful and hit lower?
How would i slow down the speed in maging. So people can't mass it.

item.title: 2 problems
item.dc:creator: @_Steven ©Steven©
item.description:
@_Steven wrote:

java.util.TimerTask;
java.util.Timer;
public abstract class TimerTask extends [url=http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/lang/Object.html]Object[/url] implements [url=http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/docs/api/java/lang/Runnable.html]Runnable[/url]

A task that can be scheduled for one-time or repeated execution by a Timer.

Since:
1.3
See Also:
Timer

public class Timer extends [url=http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/lang/Object.html]Object[/url]

A facility for threads to schedule tasks for future execution in a background thread. Tasks may be scheduled for one-time execution, or for repeated execution at regular intervals.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 problems
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

Well im sure theres a good tutorial on rune server about event timers which owns your process, but you should just make a timer that decreases every time the process is called until it reaches zero. Look at examples in your server.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 problems
item.dc:creator: @Limit101 Limit101
item.description:
@Limit101 wrote:

Can you tell me how i would add timers or give me a link to a tut maybe?

Read full topic

item.title: 2 problems
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

You need to see if your ranging maxhit is determined by the strength bonus of the item or the range bonus, but I’d just lower both if you’re wanting to make it less powerful.

As for your maging you should add timers to your spells, easily done.

Read full topic
